subject: [junit] @Before and @After Class listener
msgSnippet: Hi, How can I know when a @BeforeClass method is called? I I am using formatter to know when a suite start or a test but I need to know also if class start or
messageBody:
Hi,

How can I know when a @BeforeClass method is called?
I I am using formatter to know when a suite start or a test but I need to
know also if class start or end.
Is there a way to do that?

Thanks

--
